question: Which genes predict resistance to Entrectinib in Mammary Analogue Secretory Carcinoma?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Entrectinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Entrectinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Entrectinib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('Mammary Analogue Secretory Carcinoma')
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Pexidartinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Pexidartinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Pexidartinib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('Acute Myeloid Leukemia')
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('MDM2 Inhibitor AMGMDS3')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('MDM2 Inhibitor AMGMDS3'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('MDM2 Inhibitor AMGMDS3')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('Vulva Squamous Cell Carcinoma')
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Everolimus'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Everolimus')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('Thyroid Gland Carcinoma')
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Lorlatinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Lorlatinib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('Lung Non-small Cell Carcinoma')
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

question: List genes associated with resistance to Amrubicin in Lung Cancer.
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Amrubicin')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Amrubicin'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Amrubicin')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('Lung')
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,

  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Infigratinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Infigratinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Infigratinib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('Transitional Cell Carcinoma')
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Dasatinib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('Lung Squamous Cell Carcinoma')
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

question: List genes associated with resistance to Docetaxel in Lung Non-small Cell Carcinoma.
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Docetaxel')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Docetaxel'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Docetaxel')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('Lung Non-small Cell Carcinoma')
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('K 252a')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('K 252a'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('K 252a')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('Acute Myeloid Leukemia')
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Bicalutamide')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Bicalutamide'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Bicalutamide')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('Prostate Carcinoma')
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Selumetinib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('Cancer')
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Oxaliplatin')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Oxaliplatin'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Oxaliplatin')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('Stomach Carcinoma')
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  pmids
LIMIT 100

question: What genes are resistance biomarkers for Sorafenib in Renal Cell Carcinoma?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Sorafenib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Sorafenib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Sorafenib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('Renal Cell Carcinoma')
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Neratinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Neratinib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('Breast')
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

question: List genes associated with resistance to Fulvestrant in Her2-receptor Positive Breast Cancer.
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Fulvestrant')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Fulvestrant'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Fulvestrant')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('Her2-receptor Positive Breast')
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100
